Summary: a solid white light moved silently and quickly across the horizon and was met by another who moved together
trends: There have been no other sightings in Aurora
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details I went night fishing on Kentucky lake. It was a very clear night and I saw a bright white light travel across the sky quickly and quietly from northwest to the southeast. Another object of the same appearance rose up and met it from the east and they traveled together until out of sight. I have seen plenty of planes and helicopters and the usually have blinking lights and red and green lights. These were solid lights that were just white and did not blink. They also moved faster than planes and made no sound. I also noticed two bright streaks across the sky that were moving horizontally they looked like falling stars moving sideways from west to east.
